title: Relates to real property tax exemptions for volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance workers in certain counties
summary: Relates to real property tax exemptions for volunteer firefighters and volunteer ambulance workers in certain counties; eliminates renewal application requirement under certain circumstances.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3215

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. SWEENEY, DESTITO -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Real Property Taxation

       AN  ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to real property
         tax exemptions for  volunteer  firefighters  and  volunteer  ambulance
         workers in certain counties

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 4 of section 466-c of  the  real  property  tax
    2  law,  as added by chapter 450 of the laws of 2002 and as further amended
    3  by section 1 of part W of chapter 56 of the laws of 2010, is amended  to
    4  read as follows:
    5    4.  Application for such exemption shall be filed with the assessor or
    6  other agency, department or office designated by the municipality offer-
    7  ing such exemption on or before the taxable status date  on  a  form  as
    8  prescribed  by  the  commissioner.   ONCE GRANTED, THEREAFTER NO RENEWAL
    9  APPLICATION SHALL BE NECESSARY, PROVIDED THAT THE PROPERTY CONTINUES  TO
   10  BE  THE  PRIMARY  RESIDENCE OF THE APPLICANT, AND CONTINUES TO OTHERWISE
   11  QUALIFY, AND SO LONG AS THE AUTHORITY HAVING JURISDICTION FOR THE INCOR-
   12  PORATED VOLUNTEER FIRE  COMPANY  OR  FIRE  DEPARTMENT,  OR  INCORPORATED
   13  VOLUNTARY  AMBULANCE  SERVICE  CONTINUES  TO CERTIFY THE APPLICANT AS AN
   14  ENROLLED MEMBER PURSUANT TO PARAGRAPH (D) OF  SUBDIVISION  TWO  OF  THIS
   15  SECTION.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03008-02-1
